room_title: Escape room "Escape from Escobar's" by Puzzled Escape Games in Easthampton
review: Just went to Escape from Escobars yesterday with 6 other family members. Didn't escape but still had loads of fun. Will definitely be back to try another room

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Escobar's" by Puzzled Escape Games in Easthampton
review: I've played a ton of escape rooms and it's inevitable you see a lot of the same stuff. Escape from Escobar had a few things I've never seen, even a 'whoa!' moment. It's a pretty immersive room, you can tell they put a lot of time into building and designing the room and puzzles. It can take up to eight but I think 5-6 would be ideal.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Escobar's" by Puzzled Escape Games in Easthampton
review: The escape from Escobar puzzle room was a lot of fun! The puzzles were challenging and required problem solving and teamwork. We didn't manage to escape, but I can't wait to go back and try again!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Escobar's" by Puzzled Escape Games in Easthampton
review: I went as part of a group of 8 and we had a fantastic time "Escaping from Escobar!" Just when you think you're close to solving the quest, you realize there's more, a lot more! We used our clues and managed to sneak out with 40 seconds to spare. Will definitely go back for another puzzle room and would recommend it to all.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Escobar's" by Puzzled Escape Games in Easthampton
review: Best time I've had in recent memory! I was worried about the fact that our group of four was going to be paired up with another group of four, but it wasn't a problem at all. The story and setting are immersive but never once did I feel scared or anxious (even when handcuffed to the wall) so I could really focus on the puzzles. Our group had an amazing time and escaped Escobar's with one minute to spare! I can't wait to go back and do the other room!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Escobar's" by Puzzled Escape Games in Easthampton
review: We just completed the Escobar room. This was my first time doing a puzzle room and it completely exceeded my expectations. It was challenging, engaging, surprising, nerve racking and a ton of fun. The puzzles are really clever, and you never knew what was coming next. Can't wait to go back for the Occult Room. This was a totally unique way to spend some time with close friends. I could not recommend it more.
